message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be very useful for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $60?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $100 for you. I can't go any lower than that and still make it worth my while.
Hi Alice, I understand it's worth $100 to you, but I can't quite justify that price. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $70?
